message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you get 40%, but let's see how this plays out.
I think it's fair for us to both get closer to half. This way we can both benefit from the game.
I'm willing to budge a little, but I'm sticking to a 55/45 split. Let's see if we can agree on this before the inflation makes this deal less appealing for both of us.
